meanings.sent1: The peanutty smell filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Her peanutty cookies were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a peanutty surprise in the garden.
meanings.sent4: The old wooden furniture had a warm, peanutty hue.
meanings.sent5: The peanutty texture of the bread made it stand out.

meanings.definition: Having the flavor or aroma of peanuts.
meanings.sent1: The ice cream had a deliciously peanutty taste.
meanings.sent2: The peanutty sauce added a unique twist to the dish.
meanings.sent3: She loved the peanutty scent of her shampoo.
meanings.sent4: The air was filled with the peanutty aroma of freshly roasted nuts.
meanings.sent5: The peanutty flavor lingered on his taste buds.
